select COUNT(case when mem.sex = 'm' then sex end ) as maleCount, COUNT(case when mem.sex = 'f' then sex end ) as femaleCount, COUNT(case when mem.sex IN('m','f') then sex end) as allCount from tbl_member as mem;

SELECT count(case when '2010-01-01' <= mem.birthday then sex end) as age1, count(case when '2000-01-01' <= mem.birthday and mem.birthday < '2010-01-01' then mem.birthday end) as age0, count(case when '1990-01-01' <= mem.birthday and mem.birthday < '2000-01-01' then mem.birthday end) as age9, count(case when '1980-01-01' <= mem.birthday and mem.birthday < '1990-01-01' then mem.birthday end) as age8, count(case when '1970-01-01' <= mem.birthday and mem.birthday < '1980-01-01' then mem.birthday end) as age7, count(case when mem.birthday < '1970-01-01' then mem.birthday end) as age6, count(case when mem.birthday is not null then birthday end) as age5 FROM tbl_member as mem;
